items.title: Follow the carbon, find the money: Turning sustainability into financial value

ai.summary: Based on the available descriptionâ€¦ Rich Goode of PwC US explains that linking carbon reduction to financial impact is essential to engage business leaders. Translating emissions outcomes into cost savings and business value helps move sustainability from ambition to action and drives alignment, investment, and results.
bullets: Frame sustainability in business/financial terms to engage leadership.
A ton of carbon is abstract; financial value is tangible to decision-makers.
Translate emissions outcomes into cost savings and business value.
Leaders need to understand carbon accounting fundamentals.
Communicate sustainability in business terms to secure alignment and investment.
takeaways: Quantify emissions outcomes as financial value to make projects justifiable to leadership and finance.
Establish basic carbon accounting so emissions reductions can be measured, tracked, and reported.
Present sustainability initiatives in ROI/business terms to improve chances of funding and operational adoption.
Use financial framing to move plans from ambition to concrete actions that deliver measurable results.

items.title: Bringing In $251K A Year With 3 Jobs In The Bay Area

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Naseema McElroy, 44, is a labor and delivery nurse in Brentwood, California who brings in $251K a year across three jobs and runs a personal finance brand called Financially Intentional. She accumulated nearly $1 million in debt in 2015, documented her debt-payoff journey through her business, and was debt-free by 2017.
bullets: Naseema McElroy is a 44-year-old labor and delivery nurse in Brentwood, CA.

By 2017 she was debt-free.
This profile is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Personal brands that document life and finance journeys create ongoing demand for reliable digital publishing and storage.
Creators who monetize across multiple jobs and channels may require scalable bandwidth during audience growth or content releases.
Profiles from tech-forward regions like the Bay Area highlight a customer segment that values uptime, performance, and analytics for growth.

items.title: Cloud Cost Efficiency I The Keys to AWS Optimization | S16 E2

Use resource utilization rates to guide right-sizing and consolidation decisions.
